Subject: Allow specific users or groups to access google services
Description: The DPI configuration in our DLP has a global configuration about google, according to our current configuration, everyone can not log in to gmail and google drive on our PC. But one or two users always has this need. Without uninstalling the client, can we allow specific users or groups to access google services, how to configure?
What_We_Know__c: Need to allow users to login to google.
